divs: Sighting Details I was out looking at the unusual number of planes leaving white trails behind them. To get a better look went inside to get binoculars. While looking at where a plane just left a trail there I saw a small silver object. Tried to see it with out binoculars but it couldn't be seen. I was looking at it for about five minutes and told husband to look but it was gone by the time he got the binoculars. I thought it was amazing to see it in daytime. I have seen many at night. I was kind of shocked and excited at the same time.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ward
There were no other sightings in Ward on or around February 8th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
